abort.!doc: Aborts (client side) the XHR corresponding to the given ID if it still exists.

abortURL.!doc: Aborts (client side) all the XHR using the given URL if it still exists.

ajax.!type: fn(url: string, datatype: string, data: Object, success: Function, failure: Function, abort: Function) -> Promise
ajax.!doc: Creates an XHR object and returns the Promise.

callback.!type: fn(url: string, res: Object, fn: Function, fn2: Function, ele: HTMLElement) -> mixed
callback.!doc: Executes a serie of predefined actions once an Ajax request has been done.

download.!type: fn(url: string, filename: string, params: Object) -> undefined
download.!doc: Downloads a file with given filename from a URL.

downloadContent.!type: fn(filename: string, content: HTMLCanvasElement|File|String, type: string) -> undefined
downloadContent.!doc: Downloads a file with given filename from the given content.

getLoader.!doc: Finds the loader object corresponding to the given unique ID and returns it if found.

getRequestId.!type: fn(url: string, data: Object, datatype: string) -> String
getRequestId.!doc: Returns a unique ID for a "loader" based on the URL, the data keys and the datatype.

link.!doc: Follows a link and if needed by sending the corresponding Ajax request and executing bbn.fn.defaultPreLinkFunction.

post.!doc: Creates a POST XHR through bbn.fn.ajax then launches bbn.fn.callback with the result.

postOut.!type: fn(url: string, data: Object, success: Function, target: string) -> void
postOut.!doc: Posts a request in a new window.

setNavigationVars.!type: fn(url: string, title: string, data: Object, repl: Boolean) -> void
setNavigationVars.!doc: Changes the URL and the associated variables and updates the history.

stream.!type: fn(url: string, success: Function, data: Object, failure: Function, abort: Function, done: Function) -> Promise

treatAjaxArguments.!doc: Transforms unordered arguments into a configuratiuon object for Ajax shortcut functions.

upload.!type: fn(url: string, file: File, success: Function, failure: Function, progress: Function) -> Promise
upload.!doc: Uploads a file synchronously through an XHR indicating progress.

copy.!doc: Copies to the clipboard the value of the given string.

eraseCookie.!doc: Erase the cookie corresponding to the given name;

getCookie.!doc: If it exsists returns the cookie corresponding to the given name.

getEventData.!doc: Returns a promise having the event's data as argument.

happy.!doc: Logs the given argument in the browser's console highlighting it with a green background.

info.!doc: Logs the given argument in the browser's console highlighting it with a blue background.

isActiveInterface.!doc: Tells if the interface is beeing active for the past x seconds.

isDesktopDevice.!doc: Returns true if the current device type is a desktop.

isFocused.!doc: Checks whether the given elemet is focused or not.

isMobile.!doc: Returns true if the current browser is on a mobile device (smartphone or tablet).

isTabletDevice.!doc: Returns true if the current device type is a tablet.

log.!doc: Logs the given arguments in the browser's console.

selectElementText.!doc: Selects the content of an element.

setCookie.!type: fn(name: string, value: string, days: Number) -> undefined
setCookie.!doc: Creates a cookie and assigns it to document.cookie.

warning.!doc: Logs the given argument in the browser's console highlighting it with a yellow background and red color.

yieldToBrowser.!doc: Yields execution to the browser to allow it to process pending UI updates.

canvasToImage.!doc: Returns a canvas in a HTML element img

colorToHex.!doc: Returns the hex color of the given rgb or color name.

hex2rgb.!doc: Convert an hexadecimmal string to RGB.

imageToCanvas.!doc: Draws the given html image nto a canvas.

rgb2hex.!doc: Convert an RGB string to hexadecimal.

toCSV.!type: fn(arr: Array, valSep: string, rowSep: string, valEsc: string) -> String
toCSV.!doc: Returns a CSV string from the given array of arrays or objects.

calendar.!doc: Returns a date relative to the current day.

date.!doc: Returns a date object from the given argument.

dateSQL.!doc: Returns a date with SQL format.

daysInMonth.!doc: Returns the number of days of the month given in the date.

getChrono.!doc: Starts a timer and gives it a name.

microtimestamp.!doc: Returns the timestamp of the given seconds if an argument is given, else returns the timestamp of new Date().

startChrono.!doc: Starts a timer and gives it a name.

timestamp.!doc: Returns the timestamp of the given seconds if an argument is given, else returns the timestamp of new Date().

addInputs.!type: fn(form: HTMLElement, params: Object, prefix: string) -> undefined
addInputs.!doc: Adds the given data to the given form by inserting hidden inputs.

fieldValue.!doc: Returns the value of a form's input, differenciating between checkboxes, radio and other inputs.

formdata.!doc: Returns all the data contained in a form as a single object.

objectToFormData.!type: fn(obj: Object|Array|File, key: string, ignoreList: Array) -> undefined

submit.!type: fn(form: HTMLElement, e: Event, fn: Function) -> mixed
submit.!doc: Submit a form's data through an Ajax request.

html2text.!doc: Convert text in html format to plain text.

each.!doc: Executes the provided function on each element of the given array.

fori.!type: fn(arr: Array, fn: Function, max: Number, min: Number) -> undefined
fori.!doc: Executes the provided function on each element of the given array.

forir.!type: fn(arr: Array, fn: Function, max: Number, min: Number) -> undefined
forir.!doc: Executes the provided function on each element of the given array, going backward.

iterate.!type: fn(obj: Object|Number, fn: Function, noPrivate: Boolean, reverse: Boolean) -> Object
iterate.!doc: Executes the provided function on each property of the given object.

riterate.!type: fn(obj: Object|Number, fn: Function, noPrivate: Boolean) -> Object
riterate.!doc: Executes the provided function on each property of the given object.

analyzeFunction.!doc: Analyzes the given function and extracts details about its structure.

getTimeoff.!doc: Returns the length of time the window has not been focused in seconds.

money.!type: fn(val: String|Number, kilo: Boolean, currency: string, novalue: string, decimal: string, thousands: string, precision: Number) -> undefined
money.!doc: Returns the given value to money format basing on the given configuration.

percent.!doc: Returns the value of the proportion giving the percentage and the total from where to be calculated.

arrayFromProp.!doc: Creates and returns a new array made of the given property's values from the given array of objects.

autoExtend.!doc: Extends the bbn object by passing the namespace and the object it will merge with.

clone.!doc: Creates and returns a perfect clone - but different - from the given object.

compare.!type: fn(v1: String|Number, v2: String|Number, operator: string) -> Boolean
compare.!doc: Performs a comparison between two values based on the given operator and returns a boolean.

compareConditions.!doc: Checks whether the given data object complies or not with the given filter.

count.!type: fn(arr: Array, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string) -> Number
count.!doc: Counts the number of objects matching the given filter in the given array.

findAll.!type: fn(arr: Array, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string) -> Number
findAll.!doc: Retrieves all elements of a hierarchical array corresponding to the filter.

diffObj.!type: fn(obj1: Object, obj2: Object, unchanged: string, notRoot: Boolean) -> Object
diffObj.!doc: Returns an object describing the differences for transforming the first given object into the second.

extend.!doc: Merges the contents of two or more objects together into the first object.

extendOut.!doc: Returns a new object made of the properties from all the given objects.

filter.!type: fn(arr: Array, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string) -> Array
filter.!doc: Returns a new array with only the data matching the given filter.

filterToConditions.!doc: Converts the given object 'filter' to a valid format of condition.

getField.!type: fn(arr: Array, field: string, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string, from: Number|false, backward: Boolean) -> mixed
getField.!doc: Returns the value of the given field (property) from the first object matching the given filter in an array of objects.

getFieldValues.!type: fn(arr: Array, field: string, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string) -> mixed
getFieldValues.!doc: Returns all the unique values of the given field (property) from the first object matching the given filter in an array.

getProperty.!doc: Returns the value of the given property from the given object.

getRow.!type: fn(arr: Array, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: Number|false|String, from: Number|Boolean, backward: mixed, notFound: mixed) -> mixed
getRow.!doc: Returns the first object matching the given filter in an array of objects.

getSortingMoves.!doc: Minimal "move i -> j" plan to transform src into dst.

isWritable.!doc: Returns the value of the given field (property) from the first object matching the given filter in an array of objects.

map.!type: fn(arr: Array, fn: Function, deepProp: Boolean, level: Number) -> Array
map.!doc: Returns a new array generated by the execution of a function for each item of the given array.

move.!type: fn(arr: Array, fromIndex: Number, toIndex: Number) -> Array
move.!doc: Moves an element to a different position within the given array.

multiorder.!doc: Sorts an array of objects based on a set of properties.

numProperties.!doc: Returns the number of properties contained in the object.

order.!type: fn(arr: Array, prop: string, dir: string) -> Array
order.!doc: Sorts an array of objects based on the given property.

removeEmpty.!doc: Returns a new array, having removed all elements deemed empty from the given array.

removePrivateProp.!doc: Returns an object with the original objects' properties starting with an alphanumeric character.

search.!type: fn(arr: Array, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string, startFrom: Number) -> Number
search.!doc: Retrieves the index of the array's first element corresponding to the given filter.

shortenObj.!doc: Shortens all the strings contained in the object properties or element in a array.

sum.!type: fn(arr: Array, numberProp: String|Function, prop: String|Object|Function, val: mixed, operator: string) -> Number
sum.!doc: Returns the sum of the given property or function for the array's elements matching the filter.

unique.!doc: Removes duplicate values from an array.

baseName.!doc: Returns the name of the element indicated by path given to it as an argument.

br2nl.!doc:
Replaces the html
tag with new line characters '\ n' if present in the string.

camelToCss.!doc: Returns the string passed as an argument in camelize mode for css.

camelize.!doc: Returns the string passed as an argument in camelize mode.

cast.!doc: Returns a string from whatever value.

correctCase.!doc: Converts the first character of the string to uppercase.

nl2br.!doc:
Replaces all new line characters '\ n' with html tag '
'.

dirName.!doc: Returns the path of the folder containing the last hierarchical element of the path.

fileExt.!doc: Gets the extension from a file's name.

formatBytes.!doc: Formats the value given in bytes.

md5.!doc: Converts and returns the argument passed in a string in md5 format.

randomString.!doc: Returns a random String with random lenght,

removeAccents.!doc: Returns the string passed as an argument without accents.

repeat.!doc: Returns a string which is the repetition of the first argument for the number passed in the second argument.

replaceAll.!type: fn(find: string, replace: string, str: String|RegExp, flags: string) -> String
replaceAll.!doc: Looks for and replaces parts of string with what we want.

sanitize.!doc: Removes all unacceptable characters in a DOM node.

shorten.!doc: Shortens the given string after *len* characters.

substr.!type: fn(str: string, from: Number, length: Number) -> String
substr.!doc: Basic substring function accepting both positive and negative values.

uniqString.!doc: Create a unique string in md5 format.

addColors.!doc: Adds the given color to the object bbn.var.colors in order to be able to use

center.!doc: Centers the given element by giving it a position absolute.

lightenDarkenHex.!doc: Takes color in hex format and lightens or darkens it with the given value.

isArray.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is array.

isBoolean.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a boolean

isCanvas.!doc: Returns true if the given argumen is a Canvas.

isColor.!doc: Intended to check if the argument provided is a color.

isComment.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a dom comment;

isDataURL.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a date object.

isDate.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a date object.

isDimension.!doc: Returns true if the given value is a valid CSS dimension string or a number, false otherwise.

isDom.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a dom element;

isEmail.!doc: Intended to check if the argument provided is an e-mail address written correctly

isEmpty.!doc: Checks if the argument is empty or not.

isEvent.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is an event.

isInt.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is an integer

isIterable.!doc: Returns true if the given object can be iterated as an array (numerically).

isNotObject.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is not null or type object or array.

isNull.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is null;

isNumber.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a number

isObject.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is an object.

isPercent.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a percentage.

isPrimitive.!doc: Returns true if the given arguments are primitive;

isSame.!doc: Checks whether the data contained in the given objects is identical.

isString.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a string;

isSymbol.!doc: Returns true if the given argument is a symbol;

isValidDimension.!doc: Returns true if the given value is a valid CSS dimension string, false otherwise.

isValidName.!doc: Returns true if the given value is a valid name for a function without checking in reserved words, false otherwise

isVue.!doc: Returns true if the given argumen is a VueJS object.

init.!doc: Initializes the library bbn basing on the given configuration object.
